content_html:
Kathmandu, September 17

Sudan Gurung, coordinator of Hami Nepal, faced an attempted attack on Wednesday.

According to Gurung, a group on Pulsar motorcycles chased him from Ranibari to Baneshwar. Two cars later joined the pursuit.
“They even searched for me in the alleys of Sinamangal and chased me all the way to Baneshwar. I don’t know who they were, but it seemed they came with the intention to kill,” he told Onlinekhabar.

Gurung did not disclose his current location.

The post Attempted attack on Hami Nepal coordinator Sudan Gurung appeared first on OnlineKhabar English News.

Two cars later joined the pursuit. “They even searched for me in the alleys of Sinamangal and chased me all the way to Baneshwar. I don’t know who they were, but it seemed they came with the intention to kill,” he told Onlinekhabar. Gurung did not disclose his current location.
